title: Bawm (1989) Genesis Portion
description: Portions of Genesis translated into Bawm in 1989 by the Bangladesh Bible Society. The Bawm are an ethnic community inhabiting the Chittagong Hill Tracts of Bangladesh.

language.name: Bawm Chin
language.area: Mizoram, Chhimtuipui, Lunglei, and Aizawl districts; Tripura; Assam. Also in Bangladesh, Myanmar.
